data.title: Company
data.meta_description: Sailfin is a specialized F&A technology provider that has comprehensive offerings that cover the entire order-to-cash and procure to pay processes. Sailfinâ€™s suite of products consists of credit, receivables, deductions, cash application, cash forecasting and customer portal.
data.text:
With founder members having more than two decades of experience and expertise in the F&A domain, Sailfin helps businesses implement AR best practices, resulting in greater operational efficiency, accelerated cash flow and most importantly, happier customers.

Clients across the world have achieved significant, sustainable improvements to their DSOs, credit risk, cash flow, and profitability with Sailfin solutions.
